name: HILEKAR
description:
Hello everyone

I prepared a game about cheating. The game starts with credit debt. Our character have to pay this and he see the gamejam. He joins that but no chance for losing. He decide that making cheat.  Thus, he takes action and he turns into a game what you lived. 

The assets which in game,  were made by developer. Only some of assets were taken from internet.

https://opengameart.org/content/2d-house-tileset-128-px
https://openclipart.org/detail/322213/flat-design-2d-house
https://opengameart.org/content/2d-house-png-svg
https://openclipart.org/detail/322119/little-red-2d-house-flat-design
